decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the end of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).
Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: 2402_ID_SITE PLAN-SITE LOCATION PLAN
2402_ID_EX_800-Existing_External Elevations (planning)_sheet 1
2402_ID_EX_802-Demo_External Elevations (planning)_sheet 1
2402_ID_EX_801-Existing_External Elevations (planning)_sheet 2
2402_ID_EX_804-Proposed_External Elevations (planning)_sheet 1
2402_ID_EX_803-Demo_External Elevations (planning)_sheet 2
2402_ID_EX_805-Proposed_External Elevations (planning)_sheet 2
2402_ID_EX_FF-EXISTING - First Floor (FF)
2402_ID_EX_RF-EXISTING - Roof (RF)
2402_ID_EX_GF-EXISTING - Ground Floor (GF)
2402_ID_EX_SF-EXISTING - Second Floor (SF)
2402_ID_FF_100-General Arrangement - Proposed First Floor (FF)
2402_ID_FF_000-DEMO - First Floor (FF)
2402_ID_GF_000-DEMO - Ground Floor (GF)
2402_ID_GF_100-General Arrangement - Proposed Ground Floor (GF)
2402_ID_RF_000-DEMO - Roof (RF)
2402_ID_SF_000-DEMO - Second Floor (SF)
2402_ID_RF_100-General Arrangement - Proposed Roof works (RF)
2402_ID_SF_100-General Arrangement - Proposed Second Floor (SF)
24041 - 75 Regents Park Road NW1 - Structural Appraisal - Main roof 2nd floor
Noise Impact Assessment
241217 FINAL - Design and Access Statement
250120 FINAL Planning Statement
250129 FINAL - Heritage Policy Statement
250120 FINAL Cover Letter
Regent's Park Road - Overheating Assessment - April 2025










Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
Condition : 3 - All new external work shall be carried out in materials that resemble, as closely as possible, in colour and texture those of the existing building, unless otherwise specified in the approved application. 

Reason: To safeguard the appearance of the premises and the character of the immediate area in accordance with the requirements of policies D1 and D2 of the London Borough of Camden Local Plan 2017. 
Condition : 4 - Prior to use, machinery, plant or equipment at the development shall be mounted with proprietary anti-vibration isolators and fan motors shall be vibration-isolated from the casing and adequately silenced and maintained as such. 

Reason: To safeguard the amenities of the adjoining premises and the area generally in accordance with the requirements of policies A1 and A4 of the London Borough of Camden Local Plan 2017.
Condition : 5 - The external noise level emitted from plant, machinery or equipment at the development hereby approved shall be lower than the typical existing background noise level by at least 10dBA, or by 15dBA where the source is tonal, as assessed according to BS4142:2014 at the nearest and/or most affected noise sensitive premises, with all machinery operating together at maximum capacity.

Reason: To safeguard the amenities of the adjoining premises and the area generally in accordance with the requirements of policies A1 and A4 of the London Borough of Camden Local Plan 2017.
description: Roof replacements and remedial works. Installation of plant, reburbishment on courtyard surface and like-for-like replacements of all courtyard-facing doors and external windows
subdivision_of_building: 75A Regent's Park Road only - not the existing commercial unit (basement and ground floor) at 75 Regent's Park Road
